name: Ball And Tube Maze - Puzzle Game
name_original: Ball And Tube Maze - Puzzle Game
description:
Ball And Tube Maze is an addictive and challenging puzzle game.

The goal of this game is easy –use the supper-power items to let the ball go into the exit tube. However, there are tons of items in the way, blocks, wind, walls, etc. Come and join the magic tube maze world!

Highlights:
•Addictive and challenging gameplay
•15 different supper-power items to use
•40 great levels to explore (more levels coming soon)
•Detailed tutorial
•Achievements and leaderboard
•Well-designed graphics and sounds
•Game Center and OpenFeint Support
•It’s FREE!!!
